location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Coll 29/76 'Divergent points of view on Persian Gulf affairs of Tehran Legation and Bushire Residency'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the inside front cover with 1, and terminates at the last folio with 37; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file concerns different views on British policy in Persia and in the Persian Gulf between the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf and the British Legation at Tehran.The file is composed of correspondence between the Political Residency in the Persian Gulf, the British Legation at Tehran, the Foreign Office, the India Office, and the Government of India.
